notes: Data scraped from annuityeducator.com product review pages. Pacific Life and Nassau Life pages were inaccessible (404/redirect). Sammons Financial subsidiaries (North American, Midland National) already scraped. John Hancock has no FIA products on site. Some products (Principal, Transamerica, Equitable) are RILAs rather than traditional FIAs. Band 2/High Band rates used where multiple bands shown.

carriersNotFound.Pacific Life: Product pages returned 404 errors. URLs found in search but pages not accessible.
carriersNotFound.Eagle Life: No FIA-specific product review pages found on annuityeducator.com. Only carrier overview page exists.
carriersNotFound.Sammons Financial: Subsidiaries (North American, Midland National) already scraped in previous batches.
carriersNotFound.John Hancock: No FIA products listed on annuityeducator.com.
carriersNotFound.Nassau Life: Product pages redirect to general pages. Data not accessible.
carriersNotFound.Prudential (additional): FlexGuard and FlexGuard 2.0 are RILAs/variable products, not traditional FIAs. SurePath Income is an income-focused FIA but was not separately scraped.
